relation.text: 1787 . My dear Miſs Hamilton -- I shou
now and then , having a little Head-Ach , which she says
wrote to Mrs : Dickenson a Day or two
a few Years ; in which Time he hop
went into the Neighbourhood of Ge neva where she has now
saw Mrs : Stratford pretty often last Winter
does not act all this Summer
Summer , in various Visits . I hope
